page.title: 09ASTON-BY-STONE FARMS
page.content: There are 3 farms in this area but note that 1 is no longer farmed. 1 ASTON HALL FARM (350 acres) Mr F.Parrot owns and farms the land with grass, barley, wheat and potatoes. Stock includes Beef cattle and sheep. There are 3 workers to help. Light soil with half farm on sand and half on clay 2 ASTON FARM (400 acres) Mr R.E.Matthews owns and farms the land with grass, wheat and barley. Dairy cattle kept and 6 workers help on the farly light soils. Slightly hilly land. 3 FIELD HOUSE FARM This is now a private dwelling the land having been purchased by Mr Matthews of Aston Farm.
